formula: a(n) = 0^n + Sum{k = 0..n} 2*sin(2*Pi*(k - 1)/3)*floor((2*k - 1)/3)/sqrt(3) [with offset 0]. [Corrected and simplified by _Jianing Song_, Jan 05 2019] (End)
G.f.: 1 + U(0) where U(k)= 1 + x/(1 - x*(2*k + 1)/(1 + x*(2*k + 1) - 1/((2*k + 1) + 1 - (2*k + 1)*x/(x + 1/U(k+1))))); (continued fraction, 5-step). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Oct 07 2012
a(3*n) = 2*n, a(1) = 2, a(n) = 1 otherwise (i.e., for n > 1, not a multiple of 3). - _M. F. Hasler_, May 01 2013
